bug.author: Freemanzxp
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
transformer can't import <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
from gluonts.model.transformer import TransformerEstimator <denchmark-h:h2>Error Message</denchmark-h>
No module named 'gluonts.model.transformer'

comments.comment: That estimator is available on the master branch only until a new release is issued. Did you try installing the master branch? <denchmark-code>pip install git+https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts.git </denchmark-code>
